part2.model_answer: I vividly remember a road trip to the mountains which was incredibly Memorable [难忘的] for my whole family. We drove on a Scenic [风景优美的] highway that offered amazing views. Although the journey was Exhausting [令人筋疲力尽的] due to the distance, it was totally Worthwhile [值得的], because the destination was beautiful. We had a Puncture [爆胎] halfway, which caused a Delay [延误] in our schedule. However, we managed to Commute [通勤] to the hotel before dark. It was a Hassle [麻烦] to fix the tire. But the trip was Convenient [方便的] overall. I prefer to use Public transport [公共交通] usually to avoid traffic.

part2.model_answer: Normally, I tend to use the subway, which is the most Convenient [方便的] way to get around my city. It is very Reliable [可靠的] and faster than driving a car in traffic. It is a Memorable [难忘的] part of my daily student life routine.
